item.description: Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1461; 08:28PM; 10201 N Mason Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jrkTDD; Chatsworth; Auto vs Bicycle with one person determined dead on scene (age/gender unknown at this time). All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 4494 and the LA County Coroner. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E107 RA96; CH8; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0512; 10:22AM; 1226 S Lorena St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ubqGDp; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters (before the arrival of the additionally requested resources) extinguished the fire in 17 minutes. The fire appears to have primarily been an outside fire (numerous refrigerators et al in front of the small appliance business) which extended inside. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the attached medical clinic. The primary and secondary searches were clear. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 E1 E17 E203 E209 E21 E210 RA14 RA809 SQ21 T1 T10 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0512; 10:05AM; 1226 S Lorena St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ubqGDp; Boyle Heights; One story commercial building (possible appliance store) with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 BC13 BC2 CM22 E1 E17 E203 E209 E21 E210 EM2 RA14 RA809 SQ21 T1 T10 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0489; 10:04AM; 2900 E 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KgnYBW; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 47 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending into the attached single family dwelling. Incident command requested LAFD Arson for the investigation. No further details.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E1 E17 E2 E202 E25 E4 RA10 RA25 RA803 RA814 SQ21 T1 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0489; 09:45AM; 2900 E 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KgnYBW; Boyle Heights; One story commercial building with moderate smoke showing. The building is attached to a single family dwelling on the back side and there is possible attic extension. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E17 E2 E202 E25 E4 RA10 RA25 RA803 RA814 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0311; 08:02AM; 11850 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x6uXcT; Pacoima; All forward progress is stopped, holding the fire to less than 1/4 acre. Firefighters are finishing getting a handline fully around the perimeter. Most resources are being released with some remaining on scene to conduct mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. No injuries reported. No further details and no further updates anticipated. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC15 E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E77 E81 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H3 H5 H6 HA1 HA3 HA5 HA6 HE1 RA77 RA98 T74 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0311; 07:30AM; 11850 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x6uXcT; Pacoima; Less than 1/4 acre of medium to heavy brush with sustained 15mph winds burning within Hansen Dam. LAFD is on scene and making access to the area. LA County Fire is also responding. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC15 E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E77 E81 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H3 H5 H6 HA1 HA3 HA5 HA6 HE1 RA77 RA98 T74 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Hazardous Materials ; INC#0433; 11:22AM; 232 W 115th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u72WA5; Broadway-Manchester; A total of three patients: 28yo male was determined dead on scene, 30s yo male transported in *at least* serious condition, 30s yo male transported in fair condition. The evidence on scene indicates an overdose resulting in a death which leads to the suspicion of the unknown substance being fentanyl. LAPD, LAFD, LA IMPACT and LA Coroner are all on scene for the investigation. LAFD HazMat Squad is assisting with testing the product. Once it is identified, LAFD involvement will conclude. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 1302. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 CM32 E21 E221 E264 E57 E65 EM4 FR64 JT1 JT6 RA264 RA64 RA65 RA79 SQ21 T21 T64 TL1; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Hazardous Materials; INC#0433; 09:27AM; 232 W 115th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u72WA5; Broadway-Manchester; LAFD and LAPD Hazardous Materials Squads responding to investigate an undetermined product. Two patients appear to have been exposed and are being transported in critical condition (age/gender unknown at this time). The original 9-1-1 medical response was received at8:55AM and the incident was later upgraded to a HazMat response. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 E264 E57 E65 EM4 FR64 JT1 JT6 RA264 RA64 RA65 SQ21 T64; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Drowning - FATALITY; INC#0429; 09:05AM; 3720 S Stephen M White Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DFo8k7; San Pedro; LA County Lifeguards located and are paddling in a body (age/gender unknown). LAFD firefighter/paramedics determined death on scene. This incident is now under the jurisdiction of LAPD Inc# 1302 and LA County Coroner (identification and cause of death). The original 9-1-1 call was received at 8:52AM. No further details.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BT5 E248 E40 E48 EM6 RA79 T48; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
